performance_at_interview_what_to_improve:
Following on from your interview and feedback since, to confirm, we felt that you gave good responses and showed subject knowledge but we would suggest to you that you need to know more about teaching situations and gain some experience in the education arena  in order to give a fuller picture and stronger chance at any future interviews. 
 
Sorry we could not give more positive news but we hope the feedback makes sense and that you are successful in any future applications you make or indeed with us in the future. 
 
Kind Regards 

Amber Connelly 
Teach East Administrator
